title: Sheetal Khandal:Bigg Boss 13: Siddharth Shukla’s Balika Vadhu Co-Star Sheetal Khandal Claims He Used To Touch Her Inappropriately
text:
One of the most talked about housemate of Bigg Boss 13, Siddharth Shukla has caught the fancy of the viewers for sure. His constant arguments and fights with alleged former girlfriend and co-star Rashami Desai has already been making headlines, and now looks like another controversy has erupted to add fuel to the already raging fire.

Voot

Siddharth Shukla’s Balika Vadhu co-star Sheetal Khandal has reportedly claimed that he used to touch her inappropriately and that she has been a victim of his sexist behaviour.

Twitter

Here’s what she said:

“Many in the industry are aware of his true colors. I myself have been victim of his sexist behavior when we were working together in Balika Vadhu. He has tried on many girls, you know what I mean," a report on IWMbuzz quoted Sheetal Khandal as saying.

Not just that, she also claimed that Siddharth Shukla would make her feel uncomfortable on sets with his “wicked” ways. He would use double meaning language, she said.

“He would not only touch me inappropriately but would often use very crude double meaning language,” she said.

Well, if that’s true, it really shocking. Recently, when Siddharth Dey used derogatory language for Arti Singh, it was Siddharth Shukla who stood up for her and protested. The viewers liked the way he supported Arti in that moment. However, what Sheetal said above recently, is a bit shocking too.
